org.jpacman.framework.model

Class Tile

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jpacman.framework.model.Tile

  • public class Tile
extends Object
    An individual tile in the game, with coordinates and associations with the containing board and the sprites on the cell.
    Author:
    Arie van Deursen, TU Delft, December, 2011

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Tile(int x, int y)
      Create a new tile for the given location.

      Remove one of the sprites from this tile.

    • Method Detail

      • tileInvariant

        protected boolean tileInvariant()
        Any sprite on this tile should have its location set so that it indeed points to this tile.
        Returns:
        true iff this invariant holds

        Returns:

        public Sprite topSprite()
        Returns:

        Parameters:

        Returns:
